name: 1.6.6: Maintenance and bug fixes
body:
* Update build environment
* Fix from r4dixx for issue #65: crash when rotating settings screen with theme dialog open.

name: 1.6.4: Maintenance and bug fixes
body:
* Updated build environment
* Bug fixes:
  - Issue 60: empty meeting list text not centered vertically
  - Issue 63: chronometer sometimes not working

Maintenance release

* Updated build environment
* Added retrolambda and RxJava

name: 1.5.3: Start/stop a member clicking anywhere on the row
1.5.1: Always use the same color for a given member

body:
- Add more data binding
- Migrate lists to recycler view
- Add an "auto" option for the dark/light themes.

name: 1.3.3: maintenance release
body:
- Update to support library 24.2.0
- Update to the gradle plugin 2.1.3
- Update to gradle 2.14.1

name: 1.3.2: 24 support, improve database import file chooser.
body:
- Updated android build tools, compile version, target, and support library to version 24
- Improved the way we open the file chooser to import a database.

name: 1.2.3: Updated the about screen.
body: Gave credit for the jxl library.

name: 1.2.2: Default team members for first use.
1.2.1: dark theme, rename members
body:
- Added a new setting to choose between a dark and light theme.
- Added feature to rename a team member.
- Upgraded libraries.

name: 1.1.3: Maintenance release
body:
- Fixed code quality issues
- Replaced png icons with vector icons

name: 1.1.2: disable logging for a release build
1.0.23: fix menu text color issue on Lollipop
